## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f985946c9433e8dec885ea60292e121e23ac3d9bbfe2f1cae80882b85ce1c29e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@callcenter-frontend/services' @ 99.0.2025091-3.12 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
